translations: 高兴的（glad 的比较级）；愉快的

sentences.sentence: Glad I was to get it, and gladder had I got them both.
sentences.translation: 我很高兴收到了信，更高兴的是收到了两封。

sentences.sentence: My heart is gladder than all these Because my love is coming to me.
sentences.translation: 我的心 比这些还更欢畅因为 我的 爱情已经来到。

sentences.sentence: Want those who had you to collect only, come discharge, girl happiness, I am gladder.
sentences.translation: 只要有了你的收录，来流量了，小姑娘幸福，我更兴奋啊。
